news.title: Spot Bitcoin ETFs add $167M, nearly erase last week’s outflows
news.titleOriginal: Spot Bitcoin ETFs add $167M, nearly erase last week’s outflows
news.summary: Spot Bitcoin ETFs posted $311 million inflows this week, nearly offsetting last week’s $318 million outflows, even as BTC fell 13%.

news.title: Franklin Templeton, Binance allow tokenized MMFs as off-exchange collateral
news.titleOriginal: Franklin Templeton, Binance allow tokenized MMFs as off-exchange collateral
news.summary: Franklin Templeton is letting institutions pledge tokenized money market fund shares as collateral for trading on Binance, while keeping the fund asse

news.title: Spark’s new lending suite tests institutional appetite for onchain stablecoins
news.titleOriginal: Spark’s new lending suite tests institutional appetite for onchain stablecoins
news.summary: Spark is rolling out Spark Prime and Spark Institutional Lending, aiming to turn its DeFi stablecoin stack into institutional margin and credit lines.

news.title: Bitcoin price drops 3% as analyst warns bulls lack ‘momentum’ to flip $69K
news.titleOriginal: Bitcoin price drops 3% as analyst warns bulls lack ‘momentum’ to flip $69K
news.summary: Bitcoin analysis warned the $69,000 mark may end up as long-term resistance again, thanks to its significance in BTC price history.

news.title: Crypto super PAC to spend $5M on Barry Moore’s Senate bid: Report
news.titleOriginal: Crypto super PAC to spend $5M on Barry Moore’s Senate bid: Report
news.summary: Crypto political action committee Fairshake spent roughly $130 million during the 2024 US elections to support pro-crypto candidates.
